title: For sale Cobb bat off Polar Bear
author: Phillies*phan

posts.post_title: For sale Cobb bat off Polar Bear
posts.post_content: Bought this card recently without knowing psa is really backed up on submissions, so I’m selling it raw. The auctioneer said the consignor was in his 80’s and the cards were his fathers. This is certainly a 3 and possibly a 4. No creases. Also listed it on eBay if you want to supersize the pics. Asking $4,200 PayPal friends.

PSA isn't nearly as backed up as you might think, at least not when it comes to the good stuff. For example, I submitted a '33 Goudey Ruth card to them. The card was delivered on 10/16/20. The next day, they emailed me to tell me it was received. They then graded it and shipped it back to me on 10/19/20. That is a 3-day turnaround with a weekend sandwiched in between! This was submitted at the "Super Express" level, which would, I believe, be the same level you would be looking to submit the Cobb at ($4999 max declared value).

Hi Doug, you might do better if you put this in the T206 section.

Rick
